discourse_list.title: EIP-2029 - State counters contract (change A from State Rent v3 proposal)

content.content: Ethereum Improvement Proposals   State Rent A - State counters contract Ethereum Improvement Proposals (EIPs) describe standards for the Ethereum platform, including core protocol specifications, client APIs, and contract standards.
content.GPT-summary: The post is an Ethereum Improvement Proposal (EIP) titled "EIP-2029 - State counters contract (change A from State Rent v3 proposal)". The content briefly describes the purpose of EIPs and specifically explains the State counters contract proposal. The post does not ask for feedback, advertise, collaborate, or extend to the proposal. However, it can be audited and reviewed by a third party.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Hey @AlexeyAkhunov is it OK to comment on your PRs on Github for these approvals or is that not the right place for discussion? NVM looks like a good place to discuss.
@jochem-brouwer You are welcome to comment anywhere you like, here, or on the PR
